records.name: Titanic
records.synopsis: A seventeen-year-old aristocrat falls in love with a kind but poor artist aboard the luxurious, ill-fated R.M.S. Titanic.

records.name: Independence Day
records.synopsis: The aliens are coming and their goal is to invade and destroy Earth. Fighting superior technology, mankind's best weapon is the will to survive.

records.name: Broke Back Mountain
records.synopsis: The story of a forbidden and secretive relationship between two cowboys, and their lives over the years.

records.name: Tomorrow Never Dies
records.synopsis: James Bond heads to stop a media mogul's plan to induce war between China and the UK in order to obtain exclusive global media coverage.

records.name: A Nightmare on Elm Street
records.synopsis: The spectre of a dead child rapist haunts the children of the parents who murdered him, stalking and killing them in their dreams.
